name: We. Love. Monitoring.
tagline: A Podcast for Developers and Sysadmin who deal with their monitoring systems everyday
body:
# The Podcast

**We Love Monitoring** covers news and stories about application and infrastructure monitoring. You use monitoring every day. Stay up-to-date and listen to tool authors and practitioners like you as they tell their monitoring stories.

# Want to Be on the Podcast?

Do you have a unique perspective on monitoring? Did you write your own monitoring tool? Is your monitoring setup a labor of love? Do you hate monitoring? **The world needs to hear your voice.**

Tell us [why](mailto:alexis@le-quoc.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
